content.detailedDescription: We were in a raised hunting blind (2 of us) hunting for wild pig at night. the property is located just south of choke canyon reservoir in south central texas. it was approx 7:30 on this dark, clear night when i looked toward the nnw and saw a bright light approaching in what appeared to be a se direction of travel toward our position. i assumed it was a passenger jet crossing the country. after approx 10 minutes it had slowed to a stop in an approx wnw position and approx 15 deg above the horizon. it was at that time, when it stopped, that i pointed it out to my hunting buddy at which time he turned his powerful "spotting" scope toward the object. he thought it might be a comet or something because he saw something that resembled a tail. it must have been a long distance from us because we could not make out definite detail or outline at that point. the thing that startled both of us is when the object appreard to "bob" up and down and to the left and right every few minutes. these were  very short, controlled and steady movements and observed without visual aid. he acknowledged seeing this movement also and we agreed that this was a very unusual object. it appeared as though these strange movements happened as the object was stationary/hovering in one place. this went on for approx 10 minutes or more. the object then seemed to head off very slowly toward the nnw and no more strange bobbing was observed. it was at this point that the object appeared to attain a reddish hue. we both looked at the object through his spotting scope again,several times, over the next 10-15 minutes. what we saw was a very clear and distinctive "cresent moon shape" of light. it appeared as if a dark cylinder was moving away from us and that the sun (way past the horizon of course) was reflecting on the underside of it. however, the cressent shape was appearing in the 5 o'clock position instead of a 7 o'clock position as this object was north of due west from us. the object appeared to continue on this path, slowly getting lower and dimmer before it disappeared from our view. this entire event took approx 45 minutes. this object could have been 30 miles away or 300 miles away. there was no way to tell actual elevation or distance. i did a search and noticed that there was a report from anthony texas (near el paso) that may be related to this event. that is why i went ahead and filed this report. my friend and i are both professionals who work in houston. no drinking or drugs.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed bright white object approach from nnw, hover, bob both up and down, right and left then move off to wnw

content.detailedDescription: Just got back from eating dinner and when we pulled into the driveway, we both noticed a very low orange light.  got out of the car and it slowly flew over us in a straight path.  you could see an obvious orange glow that looked almost like a flame.  it was just before 8pm in a west end suburb of richmond, va.  my first thought was that it possibly was a drone they were testing.  no sound what-so-ever.  it was probably between 100 - 500 ft. above us.  it came from the southeastern sky and went in a straight path until we lost sight of it over the trees in the northwestern sky.
content.summary: Shape was unknown as it was too dark.  looked as if there was an orange flame in the center.  smaller than a hellicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of my house to go to the store when i looked up in the sky and saw a big fireball going across the sky that looked like a meteor. i stared at it and after about 5 seconds it suddenly changed direction various times, then a couple more appeared. they kept moving around disappearing and then reappearing . that's when i took it my phone and took video of it. i was in a hurry so i only got about 40 seconds of footage.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: They looked like big spheres with a big fire tail, kind of like a meteor, but meteors don't change direction like this.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of my house to go to the store when i looked up in the sky and saw a big fireball going across the sky that looked like a meteor. i stared at it and after about 5 seconds it suddenly changed direction various times, then a couple more appeared. they kept moving around disappearing and then reappearing . that's when i took it my phone and took video of it. i was in a hurry so i only got about 40 seconds of footage.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: They looked like big spheres with a big fire tail, kind of like a meteor, but meteors don't change direction like this.

content.detailedDescription:
Just after midnight on the morning on july 5th, 2013, i was stargazing out my bedroom window and saw a ufo heading towards my direction from the southeast. it was about 1000 yards away and slowly rising or gliding. i looked for a craft but, the lights were very bright and i could not see beyond them. 

the object had spherical lights that were bright, glowing soft orange and red in color that seemed to fluctuate like burning embers. it was pretty close as it appeared to be over another part of my neighborhood. 

i grabbed my camcorder and ran outside and it was gone. the orange color was incredibly beautiful, like a tangerine orange and very warm and soft at the same time. 

i witnessed the event from inside so i cannot say if the ufo was silent.
content.summary: Orange red ufo gliding over neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was upstairs waiting for new years to tick over. when i saw this strange light in the sky i saw it move erratically i got excited, i ran down stairs & told my sister & her fiance there was something strange in the sky we all went up stairs & we all saw it moving erratically changing path & changing altitude it was a solid bright light no flickering / pulsating.

2. waiting for new years to tick over.

3. i thought it was a airplane until i noticed it crazy speed & the way it moved & no flashing lights.

4. bright blue / grey, circle / cylinder shape or cigar, really fast speed the object dropped twice, from above the trees to where we couldn't see it anymore until it came back up. it did this twice. & then it wen't down & we couldn't see it anymore.

5. excited. pumped. a little spooked when i saw it dropped as i thought it was going to impact.

6. it went below the treeline from which we could see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright blue /.Grey light, eratic movement.

content.detailedDescription: I would describe it as a  large comb in the sky with dark orange looking lights at the bottom of the teeth.
content.summary: Dad said l"strange oblong in sky"" so i looked and sure enough there it was

content.detailedDescription: I live in miami florida and about 3 weeks ago a few friends and i witnessed quite a few orbs in the sky. i noticed one, then two then three up to about 15 orbs appearing from the same direction and heading in the same direction but not in any distinct pattern. after they had reached a certain distance from their orgin, they disappeared. the only logical thing i could come up with was that they were lanterns from some celebration or something but no one else really agreed. and now that i see that they have been seen in several places around the us.. ive began to believe they weren't lanterns.
content.summary: Red orange orbs in the sky in miami

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were at the park hanging out . i was looking at the the sky since it was dark already it was around 6:30 . then suddenly we both see a bright object in the sky at first it looked like a shooting star but then i noticed to see the object it seemed like there was an outline around it. it hovered across the sky . i knew it wasn't an airplane because the light wasn't blinking it was just bright as a star. then it suddenly stopped and stayed there for a good minute then it started to go straight down slowly while it was going down the light started to go out and i saw the outline of it better. it looked like a disk from like the movies. i was freaked out and amazed !  finally  the light went out.I just wish i had my phone to record it , :(
content.summary: Seeing a ufo in the sky in san jacinto ca

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my courtyard when i heard people saying whats that?  i looked up into the sky and saw one singular fireball falling to earth and i thought it was a asteroid, shooting start, it had a large tail and was completely on fire without a doubt.  a helicopter was in view right above the fireball and continued on a path until it was towards the san diego harbor.  one more fireball sparked in the sky and then another.  these three fireballs were falling and then stopped hovered and one changed direction and flew in a straight line between the other two as the video shows. i was very nervous and my phone was shaking as i recorded the event.  one of the fireballs made it to the horizon and disappeared then re-appeared and disappeard again.  in the mean time another fireball appeared to the north of the original event and eventually moved its way east towards the others.  i called a friend who works for a news station and he told me they said it was most likely skydivers with pyrotechnics on their shoes for the holiday bowl.  however, in my opinion none of what i saw looked anything like it might plausibly be skydivers with pyrotechnics.  i've asked others if they heard anything and no one has.  the video speaks for itself, sorry for the shakiness.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireballs sparked in the high sky fell to earth with long tails

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up the road by my house to drop off my boyfriend's badge at work at 12:15am. i noticed the object to my write because it was so bright. i was not sure what it was, but i wondered if it was a large firework. i thought this until there was no explosion and the giant ball of light shot very high up and completely disappeared. the object was bright white and looked large, at least 5 feet wide from my perspective. it appeared right above the tree lines as a large ball then shot directly upward extremely fast. the whole sighting lasted about 3-5 seconds in length. i was shocked. it caught me off guard and i swerved the car because it surprised me and it seemed so close. i lost sight of it when it disappeared high up in the sky. afterward, i dropped off the badge at his workplace and completely forgot to mention it to him or anyone for at least a week. i then had recollection of the sighting a week or more later, which is very unlike me.
content.summary: I was driving late one night and noticed a large bright ball of light shoot straight up into the air from my right. it shot really high up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home and out of my left window i saw three bright orange balls/lights? in the sky. they hovered, moved horizontally, and disappeared and reappeared. i got on the hood of my car and i took a video from my cell phone which unfortunately doesnt do it justice. the objects were bright glowing orange but they show up light in the video. please see my youtube link. i have seen something similar in the past but it was only one orange light slowly moving. i thought to myself i better shoot a video of this one.

[lin moved to fi section.Cms/tg]
content.summary: Saw three lights hovering that moved horizontally, very slowly.

content.detailedDescription: Talking on the phone outside in the twilight of evening.   very bright white light object larger than a bus and oval shaped flew over head and just above large 70 year old hardwood trees that are probably 60 feet tall.    there was no sound.  it's speed was perhaps 30 miles per hour.  it gradually climbed and increased in speed dramatically, then suddenly went straight up and disappeared.   the sighting lasted perhaps a minute and a half or less.   all i could say to the person on the phone was stutter "what, what, what????"  for about a minute afterwards.    the size and closeness of this light should have made a lot of noise and should have caused some movement of the air.    it was absolutely silent.   the person on the phone heard no noise except me and could only giggle in awe when i started telling her what i had just witnessed.    this light was absolutely pure white and exceedingly bright.
content.summary: Very large bright light came overhead just above trees within 150 ft. of me.

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog same time same route. as i got to the corner ready to cross the street i heard an airplane. i looked up to see the plane as it passed over head. i was startled by a cigar shaped object hovering over the trees to the north east. if i'd had a rock i could of hit it. the object was 10 feet above the trees and very large it was reflective like a metallic mirror on it's south side facing the sun. it was reflecting the sky. i looked back to the airplane an then i looked back at the object and realized this object was silent an seamless. nothing no windows, no undercarriage or wings an no strings it was smooth like glass. the silence scared me. i watched it for several minutes until it slowly moved away to the east an disappeared. i didn't know what i saw. i just know what i did not see.
content.summary: Walking my dog as i got to the corner to cross the street, heard airplane looked up an saw cigar shape object above trees.

content.detailedDescription: We went out to see the space lab going over at 5:26 p.M. in our front yard.  it was announced on the local news when to go out and view it.  we went out and waited. space lab came out of the north east and as it passed over into the southwest, something caught my eye up over my neighbors house i the northeast, almost at the same degree in the sky as space lab, but seemed closer to us than space lab.  i believe the strobe flashes were in our atmosphere. i called to my wife to come see these flashes.  she couldn't witness it., so i called the neighbors out of their house to come see.  three people came out.  one of those people is in the military.  all three of them saw the flashes.  these flashes were one light only.   very bright strobe (a bright camera flash) every 1/2 to 1 minute apart.  object was not moving, or did not appear to be moving. it seemed close, yet high up.  the flash was unmistakable. the flashing then quit after less than 10 minutes.  i have never witnessed this before.  it gets dark at 5:p.M. here, so we could not make out any object.  the witness who is in the military suggested it could be a chinese weather balloon.  i've never heard of this, and i did not argue, out of respect for his status.
content.summary: We went outside to watch the skylab go over. the strobe flashes appeared right after skylab passed over. it wasnt, or did not appear to be moving, then disappeared after 5-10 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
My two adult sons and i were driving home from dinner at ~9:59 pm christmas eve. we were in the houston, tx area -- about 20 miles north in spring or klein, tx. we reported the sighting promptly to a different ufo website in wa state, and were referred to your website later by friends.

my oldest son spotted it first -- looking up through some pine trees near the road we were on.  all three of us then saw it very clearly.  there were about 10 clusters of 5 or 6 bright orange or amber lights, flying in a crude formation.  i assume each of these light clusters was associated with a fairly good sized aircraft of some sort, but we could not see any shapes other than the light patterns.  at first they were low and quite bright and slow moving, maybe at 5000 ft. or less, and then they accelerated as they rose and moved off into the distance. within 2 to 3 minutes from the initial sighting these orange / amber lights had moved off rapidly toward the northwest, fading into the clear night sky, headed toward tomball, tx.  as they disappeared each of the 50 or 60 lights twinkled sort of like a distant star.

it was not fireworks -- nothing came down toward the ground and we heard no unusual noises. it was not normal aircraft ��� i have never seen an aircraft with 5 or 6 orange or amber lights and no other colors. and why would 10 of them be flying in a fairly tight formation at night anyway?  it is a real mystery ��� like nothing me or my sons have ever seen before in the 40 years i have been here.

the formation did not form a clear geometric pattern.  it was sort of random, like a pack of helicopters flying at different elevations, some nearer, some further.  each cluster of lights also did not form a clear geometric pattern.  each light cluster did not form a circle for example. if i was forced to describe each light cluster, it would be 5 or 6 orange or amber lights in roughly an e or h-pattern.  the clusters were quite a ways apart, like multiple aircraft would be to avoid collision, yet they were flying together in a crude formation. 

i know other people must have seen it, because it was very clear and there were other people out and about.  we tried to take a picture but did not get a good one. we did not react quickly enough and also there were white street lights obscuring the sky and confusing the iphone camera where we pulled over to stop the car.
content.summary: 10 clusters of orange or amber lights

content.detailedDescription: Traveling to visit my wife's parents around xmas in 1975. as reached the summit of the mtn. directly in front of us at about 100ft above us we saw a disc shaped craft with blinking lights on the bottom going in a circular motion. i first thought it was a helicopter flying to low so i quickly rolled my window down to hear it but there was hardly any sound, sort of a hum. i was traveling in about a 30 or 40 degree decent. there was a pretty heavy fog and it was quickly out of our sight. concerned it might crash i stopped the car to listen but heard no sounds. the object appeared to be traveling at about 30 mph. we were young at the time with one baby and we decided not to tell anyone about it in case they would make lite of us. i have now seen another 35yrs. later and i know it is about time to tell of what we have seen.
content.summary: My wife and i were traveling by car to visit her parents when as we topped the top of the mtn. it crossed in front of us. it appeared round in shape with lights circling on the bottom. decended down into a hollow at about 35 or 40 degrees.

content.detailedDescription: On december  25th, 22014 at approximately 7:15 p.M.I was walking my dog on the beach in monterey. i noticed something way off in  the distance to the northeast. it was headed towards monterey from the santa cruz area. as i continued to watch it coming closer, i noticed  it looked like a bonfire  in the sky. as it got closer, i was concerned for a bit that it was a plane on fire ready to explode.There is an airport about two miles south. then i realized  it was not an airplane or a helicopter, because when it was overhead and to the right of me it stopped completely still for about 45 seconds...Or longer. i was not scared, just completely amazed and stunned because it was a big fireball in the sky that had travelled all the way what seemed to be slowly and evenly  across the monterey bay from the northeast to the southwest and came to a complete stop right above me....Making no sound. what happened next was really surprising.....It went straight up into the sky. not fast - not left or right -  straight up. as it ascended it got smaller and smaller and suddenly - and sadly :( disappeared.  it was a very clear, beautiful night -- not a cloud in the sky. when it disappeared i felt like i saw a little cloud or puff of  fog - even though the sky was without a cloud or fog.Needless  to say, it was utterly amazing.
content.summary: I saw a bright  orange light in the  distance to the northeast  heading toward the northwest, where i was standing on the sidewalk next to the beach.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in lawn chair smoking cig looked up saw 8-10 triangular lights just above treetops as the object glided over the lights started to crisscross or scan as it went over the apartment roof top i climbed on car to see where it went, it had already been in the hills.
content.summary: Saw triangular shaped lights stationary at first then lights criscrossed no sound

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my office in my detached garage. for no reason i picked up an older 3.2mp hp 733 digital camera and went outside. the camera must have been set to consecutive multiple shot mode. it was late (10:00pm-2:00am) and snapped 4 consecutive pictures one right after the other. i did not see the object at all. however, when i loaded the pictures onto my computer sometime later i was shocked that i had taken them. i did not remember doing this nor am i sure if i had a missing time experience. the date of 9-2-12 pm is when i actually dumped them to my hard drive. the photo names may give clue to their original date. the incident could have been up to several months to weeks before 9-2-12. adding to this, i just recently came across the photos last week. needless to say i was bewildered.

 in the four photos is plainly shown the acrobatic maneuvers of the object(s). paying strict attention to the background stars not moving, it is obvious that this was not just a shaky camera hand causing the blurs, streaks, and 3d loops etc.

 if you locate a star in the 1st photo it remains in the same place throughout the next three shots if you quickly slide through them. the photo properties shows a shutter speed for each picture was set at 1/30th of a second. given this information, all four snaps took 2/15ths of a second.

i have seen similar photos of unknowns on the internet through the years and i think i have had an unexplainable event take place to myself and possibly my wife. 

 you must zoom in to fully understand the erratic motion.

d.B.
content.summary: I was in my office in my de-tatched garage. for no reason i picked up an older 3.2mp hp 733 digital camera and went outside. it was late (10:00pm-2:00am) and snapped 4 consecutive pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
witness and i have observed strange lights in the park in winston over the summer, appearing on clear nights. one night, a four star constellation was seen in the sky in the east. it was also observed that the big dipper was directly north at the time. 

  lights are seen between 2 am and sunrise on clear nights. the lights that you see just before it gets dark are always located in the same area which would be sw from riverbend park. (government perhaps).

  the lights seen in the park react to a laser pointer. moving closer, farther away sometimes. the lights i recorded appeared star-like or like a satellite which would be closer. they seemed to be between the school and the mountain behind it. as i recorded, i was still, yet they were moving. 

  they look very solid in appearance on film. they seem to be controlled by someone or something. our animal gets nervous and uneasy at times as do we. i have a android app that tells when electromagnetic interference goes on. when they react to us is when it happens.

  police scanner posts a code; activate the heart of gold. heard often during the summer of these occurrences.

  i did my own editing and added music instead of hearing useless swear words. i have also added a quick video of the inside of our location during daylight hours.
content.summary: Star-like lights seen, responsive to lazer pointer. appear solid when filmed.

content.detailedDescription:
i was out camoing with my friend and around 2 am a ufo landed. and aliens came out of the craft and took us aboard. they point to a few pictures and gave of each a crystal. i am having a hard time dealing with this all and there is no one to tell so i thought i would post here. 
   the crystal is small about an inch square and yellow so i know it really happened..
content.summary: Went out camping with a friend and a ufo landed and took us aboard.

content.detailedDescription:
in the spring of 2010, i had been burning garbage with a neighbor and new drummer during darkness. neighbor asked me, "what's that". when i looked directly east (over my house), there was a huge triangle hovering over the house. it had a light on each corner, (3 lights) and slowly turned and approached us. i couldn't move. the triangle came almost directly over us. if i could have moved, i could have hit it with a rock. the triangle blocked out the sky, changed light patterns independant of it's three corners, and made absolutely no sound. none of the three of us moved, ran, made any noises, fainted, pissed our pants, or even blinked. 
     some time had passed, but i don't know how.

the huge black triangle finally quietly moved toward the south. it made no sound. it seemingly floated out of sight very quickly......And it was gone.

     both men that were with me, said almost nothing. the neighbor and my new drummer both immediately went home to bed, and i locked the yard gate, crossed the street back to the house, and went directly to bed. 
     when i woke up the next morning, i could barely remember having had the experience. seems that i lost about an hour and had to force myself to remember what had happened. i can't imagine anyone seeing something of this nature, and wanting to go to bed directly afterward. 

     my feeling is that i had been detained, analysed, tagged, and released. i now have a red bump on my left knee that wont't go away, nor heel. i would like to have it checked out to see what the hell happened to me that night. the neightbor had been a pill eater,....But he kept complaining for years that those damn ships keep coming for him. he didn't like being outside in open areas, he kept his eyes on the skies, he talked every day of his life about the aliens watching him, he described them to me before the incident, he warned me about them,.....
now i think they're following me too.
content.summary: Football field sized triangle hover just over our heads without sound for unknown time. had three lights which changed

content.detailedDescription:
Date: 12/17/13 (tuesday)
time: 7:00 pm
weather: 60-70.
sky: clear. no clouds. moon. air traffic.
activity: leaving pilates class @ sisters home.
encounter: sighting/comm/scan.
encounter/observation summary:
observed sky as usual. 
air traffic going s-n & another going e-w. 
during watch of plane from e-w, noticed a large, star like object crossing from ne to sw. straight up. overhead.
color: white. in the front of the object was a color combination of: blue/green.It covered a portion of the white star like object at the top like a horse shoe affect.
flight path: straight projectory path. no blinking. no sound. 
approx. guess of altitude: 30,000 or more.
size: using arm length holding pencil - it was the size of the tip of the pencil but round. 
rounds of questions & comms:
first thought of as possible plane. second thought of large moving sat.
third thought was to begin a line of telepathic comm to check.
"are you a ufo?"  no response.
"are you the tall goldens?"  no response.
"if you are a ufo, would you please slow down to confirm my comm?" 
* the object slowed down. (i was surprised)
sense: a robotic/bio hybrid tech. combination
"since you are a ufo, would you please consider stopping?  would you stop?"
* the object stopped. (i think it was here that i heard back: "we are on surveillance"
my comms kept up in repetition:
"turn around. please come back. im ready. over here."
* following about a minute, the object began a slow u-turn. 
i took a lot of deep breaths.
* the object stopped about half way to me.
my comms kept repeating as before:
"keep coming. im ready. over here. please position above me."
* few seconds later, the object resumed movement & took position at 90 above my head. it maintained the same distance.
the blue/green color seen as it was first observed, had vanished and the object was only a solid round white circle.
i was still standing, with my hands holding the back of my head to see upward & because it was uncomfortable. 
sense: this was similar to 2008 & encounter with star like object that received comm & entered atmosphere using short term wormhole with 2 gravitational lines. difference: this was more of a robotic/bio sense in the comm return.
i got prepared for a light beam to be taken up. however, that is not what occurred.
digital scan:
a type of translucent cylinder came down over me containing digits/numbers.
right & left side. cool. unusual odor. frozen. face forward now. hands at side. (similar to other times being held in place with weight like shoes on feet, but this time the whole body was frozen)
number in descending order: 8   1   0
right side only. 
second type scan of energy this time sent down the middle of the body reaching only to the thoracic area & then going back up to the head.
this felt like something was searching to id who or what i was. 
sense: they did not locate a chip or id.
* "no room"  ( comm from them)
the cylinder, numbers, and energy were lifted off and returned back upward like it came down.
i was released.
following the scan:
walked over to a car in the driveway, put my head against the side of the top of the car and kept looking up.
a second star or object was released from the first stationary star like ojbect. it traveled to approx. the same distance where it had turned around. took a stationary position.
i asked: "is there going to be anymore comm? you arent going to pick me up or give me a ride or purpose as to this encounter? why are you stopped?"
* "if we stay still it is harder to be tracked."
(at first this did not make sense, but then i referred myself back to the 2008 sighting & remembered that craft seen then was seen at first beside another star and looked like one at first glance)
"if you are not going to communicate anymore, then i am going home."
returned to car & drove home. sat outside my house for about 15 minutes looking up at the stars hoping that something would return. i also need time to process this incident.
feelings, reactions, theory:
in awe. new encounter. not familiar with this. familiar with entities and being aboard crafts with or without military. wondered if it would affect me negatively in my physical body. 1)this was our tech. 2) out tech with the ets. 3) et tech only.  whoever and however this is, this one has a hybrid/tech/bio life form which can process telepathic comm. that is amazing. 
i feel connected in a new way to a mathematical universe.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7pm.Clear. lrg.Starlikeobj.Ne-se. tel.Comm. sloweddn. stopped. chgd.Dir. returned & hovered. digital scan. sent out 2nd star to other location. no pick up. ret. home.

content.detailedDescription: Just after 9:00pm on thursday, december 26, i caught out of the corner of my eye what i thought was a shooting star. i quickly realized it was not a shooting star due to its trajectory and low altitude. it was a very brilliant white light orb heading from the south east foothills over san jose, heading north. it flew over downtown, which is where i viewed this event and continued north. i had a very clear view of it as it flew overhead. it was travelling very fast, which if i had to guess would be in excess of 600 to 700 mph. i watched it till it flew out of sight.
content.summary: White orb light flying north at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
We were out at a country house in the country side (noordehook), cape town, where we would regularly lay out on the grass at night and observe the night sky, finding moving objects regularly, which we assumed to be satellites ! being very familiar with that night sky, i noticed a bright star that shouldn't be there! i mentioned it,...And we both looked, and i said again,.."that shouldn't be there. right" my friend was the more experienced star person,...And eventually had to say ,..."no it shouldn't be there" it looked like any of the other closer stars! then within 10 seconds its brightness tripled, it seemed to expand with the brightness a bit, then instantly faded to a pin prick, then blinked out! we were speechless, stunned, and profoundly moved by the uniqueness and unusual experience,...That we realized was a moment in time, that was a matter of seconds, to see and experience this together. when we remember it, its like it was yesterday, with all the wonder and weirdness! 

any thoughts would be appreciated!

[names removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Familiar with the night sky we were observing, we noticed a bright star that shouldn't be there, we mentioned it to each other without an explanation,...Them within seconds it 's brightness doubled, expanded somewhat, then blinked out completly!

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,N/A
content.summary: A giant mothership, like a reversed mountain,..And muchlittle spere going outside and inside mothership,...I was with other 3 people and only one see and remember abut that..

content.detailedDescription:
This is so difficult to explain.  my boyfriend and i went outside onto our front porch around midnight one am.  it happened  so fast, i had my back turned away facing the east, my boyfriend was facing the west.  i saw everything around me light up very bright and a burning sensation in the middle of my back then a pulling i even stepped back from it, the pulling made me step back.  i turned around and asked my boyfriend what was that?  he said "i don't know."  then he told me he saw a very bright large circle of light that flew trough the trees without breaking limbs right towards us.  then it stopped for a second hovered then pulled back and was sucked up like into a blackness.  then we saw a large white light reflecting in the clouds in the west, the light moved towards us only this time not as an object just as a flood of light.  once again it stopped sucked backwards and the sky went dark.

right now it is 12-30-2013 and as i am writing this report my boyfriend went out onto the front pouch alone, he just came in and told me this is crazy the power surged out there, but not in here.
content.summary: Bright white circular light from east very big zooming at us went through trees without breaking limbs straight at us, paused then sucked backwards

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of the garage , go to house look up and saw a bright orange coming at me, it stop then it move to the left about 50 yd. stop move 100yd.Then went back the way came  nw. time 6:45
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Look at the mt. nw.Of me, saw a bright orange light coming at me

content.detailedDescription:
On dec 25th, 2013 at approximately 9:00 p.M. (cdt)i was driving home when
i noticed a dark object with lights maneuvering above the golf course across the street from my condo building. it looked like a big whale rolling around in the surface of the ocean. my view was partially obscured
by the tree line and the darkness of night. i stopped the car and watched.
i proceeded very slowly forward. the car became engulfed in light as i saw
head lights coming at me which were getting bigger and brighter. i felt my
jaw drop open, and then darkness as it passed over my car. i jumped out
and saw two parallel lights about 10-12 feet apart moving away from me at
tree top level again. the lights were a dull silver and strobbed. i was
terrified and in shock.
content.summary: Ufo attack !
